issues.title: Intermittent Connection Issues
issues.description: Due to a server outage, the whiteboard was inaccessible.

stepsTakenThisFar.message: Issue has been fixed. Operations should be back to normal.
We identified the cause and we are working on a fix.

issues.title: Slow loading times
issues.description: Due to a server outage, Papers loaded slower than usual.

stepsTakenThisFar.message: Issue has been fixed. Operations should be back to normal.
We identified the cause and we are working on a fix.
